name: Class DatagramSocketImpl
text: Abstract datagram and multicast socket implementation base class.
codes:
public abstract class DatagramSocketImpl
extends Object
implements SocketOptions

methods.method_sig:
protected abstract void create()
                        throws SocketException

protected abstract void bind (int lport,
                             InetAddress laddr)
                      throws SocketException
methods.description: Binds a datagram socket to a local port and address.

methods.method_sig:
protected abstract void send (DatagramPacket p)
                      throws IOException
methods.description:
Sends a datagram packet. The packet contains the data and the
 destination address to send the packet to.

methods.method_sig:
protected void connect (InetAddress address,
                       int port)
                throws SocketException
methods.description:
Connects a datagram socket to a remote destination. This associates the remote
 address with the local socket so that datagrams may only be sent to this destination
 and received from this destination. This may be overridden to call a native
 system connect.

 If the remote destination to which the socket is connected does not
 exist, or is otherwise unreachable, and if an ICMP destination unreachable
 packet has been received for that address, then a subsequent call to
 send or receive may throw a PortUnreachableException.
 Note, there is no guarantee that the exception will be thrown.

methods.method_sig: protected void disconnect()
methods.description: Disconnects a datagram socket from its remote destination.

methods.method_sig:
protected abstract int peek (InetAddress i)
                     throws IOException
methods.description:
Peek at the packet to see who it is from. Updates the specified InetAddress
 to the address which the packet came from.

methods.method_sig:
protected abstract int peekData (DatagramPacket p)
                         throws IOException
methods.description:
Peek at the packet to see who it is from. The data is copied into the specified
 DatagramPacket. The data is returned,
 but not consumed, so that a subsequent peekData/receive operation
 will see the same data.

methods.method_sig:
protected abstract void receive (DatagramPacket p)
                         throws IOException

protected abstract void setTimeToLive (int ttl)
                               throws IOException

protected abstract int getTimeToLive()
                              throws IOException

protected abstract void join (InetAddress inetaddr)
                      throws IOException

protected abstract void leave (InetAddress inetaddr)
                       throws IOException

protected abstract void joinGroup (SocketAddress mcastaddr,
                                  NetworkInterface netIf)
                           throws IOException

protected abstract void leaveGroup (SocketAddress mcastaddr,
                                   NetworkInterface netIf)
                            throws IOException
protected abstract void close()
protected int getLocalPort()
protected FileDescriptor getFileDescriptor()
methods.description: Gets the datagram socket file descriptor.

methods.method_sig:
protected <T> void setOption (SocketOption<T> name,
                             T value)
                      throws IOException
methods.description: Called to set a socket option.

methods.method_sig:
protected <T> T getOption (SocketOption<T> name)
                   throws IOException
methods.description: Called to get a socket option.

methods.method_sig: protected Set<SocketOption<?>> supportedOptions()
methods.description:
Returns a set of SocketOptions supported by this impl
 and by this impl's socket (DatagramSocket or MulticastSocket)
